channel.title: Where do i look for to change the place a new players spawns?
channel.description: Where do i look for to change the place a new players spawns? Im think its in the 'Client' File but i can't find it? If it is, where do i need to look for it?

item.title: Where do i look for to change the place a new players spawns?
item.dc:creator: @Get_Forgotten Get_Forgotten
item.description:
@Get_Forgotten wrote:

in PI or base started using PI its in config you’ll see something like this

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 2695; // start here public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3380; public static final int RESPAWN_X = 2965; // when dead respawn here public static final int RESPAWN_Y = 3354; public static final int DUELING_RESPAWN_X = 3362; // when dead in duel area spawn here public static final int DUELING_RESPAWN_Y = 3263; public static final int RANDOM_DUELING_RESPAWN = 5; // random coords

the rest is really self explanitory

Read full topic
item.source: Where do i look for to change the place a new players spawns?

item.title: Where do i look for to change the place a new players spawns?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

client.java you need to find the coordinates of where they player already spawns and then change them to the new spawning coordinates
